Plot: FBI agent Erica Reed has an ability to see certain past events. Her co-worker and love interest is kidnapped by a female serial killer he was investigating. The serial killer who killed Erica's brother may have had an accomplice.
Title: Cognition: An Erica Reed Thriller - Episode 2: The Wise Monkey
Writer: Cesar Bittar, Nick Bryan (writing and additional design), Katie Hallahan, Jane Jensen (story)
Actors: Reid Martin Basso, Anna K. Brennan, Amy K. Browne, Ricardo Cabral
